description: This PHP source file manages the 'Add Allowed Device' feature in a web-based content control system. It includes form handling, JavaScript for client-side validation and interactions, dynamic generation of device lists from device data, and functionality to add devices to the allowed list with specified time restrictions.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves string parameter values from the device configuration.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Fetches parameter values for device host entries.

methods.name: getInstanceIDs
methods.description: Retrieves instance IDs for device host entries.
